subject: Football
Concussions
lead_paragraph: The Jets will face the Pittsburgh Steelers’ speedy receivers without their All-Pro cornerback Darrelle Revis thanks to a concussion he sustained in the season opener against Buffalo.
snippet: The Jets will face the Pittsburgh Steelers’ speedy receivers without their All-Pro cornerback Darrelle Revis thanks to a concussion he sustained in the season opener against Buffalo.
